name: Sardas
description:
Sardas was the High Chancellor of Ophidae City. He became relevant after discovering the lost history of Atornia from a secret chamber underneath Ophidae City's library. After the collapse of Atornian society, Sardas and his men were sent into the unknown space and found the skeleton of a human with an unknown language tattooed on its wrist. He brought the human back to Ophidae City and started the Project Atornia which lasted for over a century.

--

AI Portrait, made with a carefully picked prompt, a handcrafted start image, and a chain of several GANS. Delivered to all of you, as is. There are not edits beyond contrast/color correction and some re-focusing.

2024x2024 pixels

300 dpi
